9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Prophet garlanded two sandals and marked the Hadi on the right side at Dhul-Hulaifah, and removed the blood from it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِشْعَارِ الْبُدْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Marking The Budn (Sacrificial Camels)
